phrases.original: The Invites App is a tool for evangelism, created for disciples of Jesus who are both eager and grateful to share their faith. If this describes you, then this app can be of great benefit to your evangelism!
phrases.translated: The Invites App is a tool for evangelism, created for disciples of Jesus who are both eager and grateful to share their faith. If this describes you, then this app can be of great benefit to your evangelism!

phrases.original: The Invites App lets you share your faith by inviting someone to a church-related event.  The app generates a link, and you send that link to the invitee (via SMS, e-mail, WhatsApp, or QR code).  The recipient clicks on the link, and sees a Web page with all of the event details (including maps). The link is specific to (1) the sender, (2) the recipient, and (3) the event, enabling the invitation to be completely personalized.

phrases.original: Share Even When Time is Limited:
phrases.translated: Share Even When Time is Limited:

phrases.original: Share all of the event's details to the invitee's device instantly, freeing you to use a brief moment to build rapport instead of fixating on details. The whole interaction can take place within one minute.
phrases.translated: Share all of the event's details to the invitee's device instantly, freeing you to use a brief moment to build rapport instead of fixating on details. The whole interaction can take place within one minute.

phrases.original: Leverage the power of calendar reminders to help invitees remember to attend, even when their device does not have a signal.
phrases.translated: Leverage the power of calendar reminders to help invitees remember to attend, even when their device does not have a signal.

phrases.original: Never again forget or overlook anyone you've invited. Centralize all of your follow-up calls and texts. Take notes. You can even send yourself follow-up reminders, all from one convenient place.
phrases.translated: Never again forget or overlook anyone you've invited. Centralize all of your follow-up calls and texts. Take notes. You can even send yourself follow-up reminders, all from one convenient place.

phrases.original: Use digital maps to plan your local outreach, maximizing your likelihood of meeting open people.
phrases.translated: Use digital maps to plan your local outreach, maximizing your likelihood of meeting open people.

phrases.original: Within the church, if you lead a group (whether a Bible Talk or even a world sector), you can easily equip your entire membership with access to the Invites App.
phrases.translated: Within the church, if you lead a group (whether a Bible Talk or even a world sector), you can easily equip your entire membership with access to the Invites App.
